data.title: OMGOD!!  THE BEST Cookies
data.text: My husband is a great home baker of cookies. Friends and neighbors always wait for him to make cookies. But Breks is THE BEST and if anything put my husbands cookies to shame, As a side note he does not read my reviews and I am hopeful he will not know that I was cheating on him with other cookies!!!  I had Key Lime pie cookie was best of the, The Peanut butter with PB chips in them were sensational. The Red Velvet cookie was chocolaty goodness, which NEVER happens in red velvet. They are supposed to taste like chocolate but never do somehow. The chocolate chip cookie was classic, but I have not yet tried the Cheesecake or the Oatmeal Raisin.  They are so sinfully delicious I am both mad and glad they are just down the street from me. If you don't try these cookies you are doing yourself an injustice.

data.title: Old ice cream
data.text: We had a wonderful lunch down the street and came back here for the ice cream and cookies. The ice cream was gritty and tasteless. At least the coconut ice cream was that way. The cones were old and stale. My wife ended up throwing hers out.  As for the PB cookie, it was good, but rather doughy. The lady was slightly friendly, but seemed more intent to get back to her bookkeeping. The place is cute.

data.title: So delicious
data.text: This homemade cookies are to die for.  Forget the diet....  After eating stroll down to the lakefront and walk off the extra calories  :-)

data.title: Most awesome homemade commercial cookies ever
data.text: Any flavor you try will be delicious. No other cookies like them. Big chunks of add ins, chewy, soft, a large selection of varieties of flavors. Just try and only pick one!

data.title: Great cookies...yum!
data.text: Charming little place with fabulous cookies...yum! Very unusual since small little cookie shops are not that commonly found. Good location in the heart of Kissimmee near Disney World.

data.title: You won't be sorry!
data.text: Some amazing cookies!  Try the lavender white chocolate ones, I know it sounds different, but trust a local on this!

data.title: Excellent
data.text: Magnificent cookies I am very sad that I have not had them in a long time. My favorite cookie there is the sugar cookie they are superb.

data.title: Not so Great
data.text: We stopped by for a sweet treat trying to support  local small business, but I guess I was expecting a Bakery type experience. They had a limited supply of cookies on display which were way smaller than the ones you see commercially sold at 7-11 or such places and they were fairly expensive. They tasted ok. Nothing super special about the flavor. In my opinion, this could be a place to skip on your next trip downtown.
